Translations.Text: Ma d wid ijehlen, inekoen issekniyen nneÂ£, akked temlilit n laxeot, widak ar uaaqeb ara rsen
Gedha s Oebbi, tameddit nnwen, tauebeit nnwen
I Neppa ccekoan, di tmurt akked igenwan, tameddit u di pnaufa n wass
Issuffu$ ed amuddir si lmegget. Issuffu$ ed lmegget seg umuddir. Issidir akal, deffir tmeppant is. Akka ara d teff$em
Seg issekniyen iS: Ixelq ikwen seg wakal. Aql akwen d imdanen tembwezzaam
Seg issekniyen iS: Ixelq awen, segwen, tiaggaltin nnwen, a pzed$em yidsent. Irra garawen tayri, lmaenana. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Seg issekniyen iS: lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, amgirred ger tutlayin nnwen, akked initen nnwen. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i imusnawen
Seg issekniyen iS: ives nnwen deg iv, deg wass, anadi nnwen n lfevl iS. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud isellen
Seg issekniyen iS: Issenaat awen leboaq, degs tugdi, asirem. Issadar ed aman seg igenni, Issidir yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud ifehmen
